summary: Philips Lighting prices IPO at €19.25 per share
description: On May 2, 2016, Philips Lighting N.V. (the newly independent Lighting business) set its initial public offering price at €19.25, valuing the company at approximately €3.5 billion. Investor demand was strong, with the order book oversubscribed 2.3×. The pricing reflected confidence in the spin-off’s growth strategy around connected lighting systems and LED innovation.
snippet: Lighting IPO priced at €19.25 amid 2.3× oversubscription.
